a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Threshold income or consumption for each decile, World, 1990 to 2022
The level of after tax income or consumption per person per day below which 10%, 20%, 30%, etc. of the
Data source: World Bank Poverty and Inequality Platform (2024)
Note: This data is measured in international-$ at 2017 prices to account for inflation and differences in the cost of living between
countries. It relates to income measured after taxes and benefits, or to consumption, per capita.
